mapper.select: SELECT m.user_key, ic.ic_name, i.amount, i.income_date FROM member AS m JOIN income AS i ON i.user_key=m.user_key JOIN income_category AS ic ON ic.ic_id=i.ic_id WHERE m.user_key=#{userKey} AND i.income_date LIKE #{incomeDate}

SELECT m.user_key, ec.ec_name, e.amount, e.expense_date FROM tp.member AS m JOIN tp.expense AS e ON e.user_key=m.user_key JOIN tp.expense_category AS ec ON ec.ec_id=e.ec_id WHERE m.user_key=#{userKey} AND e.expense_date LIKE #{expenseDate}
SELECT transfer_id, mem_asset_id_from, mem_asset_id_to, amount, transfer_date, memo FROM transfer WHERE user_key=#{userKey} AND transfer_date LIKE #{transferDate}

SELECT i.user_key, i.income_id, i.ic_id, ic.ic_name, i.memo, i.mem_asset_id, aom.memo AS aom_name, aom.assets_id, ass.assets_name, i.amount, i.income_date FROM income AS i JOIN income_category AS ic ON i.ic_id=ic.ic_id JOIN assets AS ass ON ass.assets_id=i.assets_id JOIN assets_of_member AS aom ON aom.mem_asset_id=i.mem_asset_id WHERE i.user_key=#{userKey} AND i.income_date=#{incomeDate}

SELECT e.user_key, e.expense_id, e.ec_id, ec.ec_name, e.memo, e.mem_asset_id, aom.memo AS aom_name, aom.assets_id, ass.assets_name, e.amount, e.expense_date FROM expense AS e JOIN expense_category AS ec ON e.ec_id=ec.ec_id JOIN assets AS ass ON ass.assets_id=e.assets_id JOIN assets_of_member AS aom ON aom.mem_asset_id=e.mem_asset_id WHERE e.user_key=#{userKey} AND e.expense_date=#{expenseDate}

SELECT t.user_key, t.transfer_id, t.mem_asset_id_from, t.mem_asset_id_to, t.amount, t.transfer_date, t.memo, assf.assets_id, asf.assets_name AS assets_name_from, assf.memo AS aom_name_from, ast.assets_id AS assets_id_to, ast.assets_name AS assets_name_to, asst.memo AS aom_name_to FROM transfer AS t JOIN assets_of_member AS assf ON assf.mem_asset_id=t.mem_asset_id_from JOIN assets_of_member AS asst ON asst.mem_asset_id=t.mem_asset_id_to JOIN assets AS asf ON asf.assets_id=assf.assets_id JOIN assets AS ast ON ast.assets_id=asst.assets_id WHERE t.user_key=#{userKey} AND t.transfer_date=#{transferDate}
SELECT mem_asset_id, user_key, type, amount, assets_id, memo FROM assets_of_member WHERE mem_asset_id=#{memAssetId}
SELECT aom.mem_asset_id, aom.assets_id, ass.assets_category, ass.assets_name, aom.memo FROM assets_of_member AS aom JOIN assets AS ass ON ass.assets_id=aom.assets_id WHERE aom.user_key=#{userKey}
SELECT mem_asset_id, type, amount, assets_id, memo FROM assets_of_member WHERE user_key=#{userKey} AND assets_id=#{assetsId}
SELECT sum(amount) FROM income WHERE user_key=#{userKey} AND income_date LIKE #{incomeDate}
SELECT sum(amount) FROM expense WHERE user_key=#{userKey} AND expense_date LIKE #{expenseDate}
